name: CodeMobile
content: CodeMobile is a UK developer conference that has been created by developers who love creating apps in the mobile space. Its an opportunity to network, share ideas and to provide an opportunity for developers to collaborate. The conference has 2 tracks, one focussed on iOS development, the other on Android. The conference takes place in Chester, on the North-Wales border and can easily be accessed by public transport from London, Manchester, Liverpool and other major cities.
